title: Metalottery.Win
author: Metalottery.Win
content: Fair play and an exciting experience, without fee and risks. Metalottery built on smart-contacts and powered by blockchain protocol. Generated numbers based on a unique formula that impossible to be manipulated. It’s easy to play – if the digits on your tickets match the winning numbers in the correct order, you win a portion of the prize pool.CHOOSE NUMBERS Choose 6 numbers between 0-9.PAY THE TICKET ~$5.06 or 1.58 PLT per ticketCHECK FOR PRIZES Once the round’s over, come back to the page and check to see if you’ve won!About usOur goal is to provide a social-community gaming response to this need, in a dynamic transparent way.have you invested in cryptocurrencies yet? Of course, buying Bitcoin today is not as profitable as it was in 2009. But there is still an opportunity to invest in a promising project that can bring good profits right now.We are talking about a new PLT token using smart contract technology.This is a really special coin because it allows you not only to invest in cryptocurrency but also to take part in the lottery and get valuable prizes.We have developed and launched Pool Lotto Token in 2021. And in the first year, the currency showed excellent results:https://i.imgur.com/rLIjkqC.pngIt is important that PLT has excellent prospects because the total online lottery market is more than 10 billion dollars.We are pleased to present you with an interesting and promising cryptocurrency project, where you can not only earn money by buying and holding PLT cryptocurrency but also get valuable prizes by participating in regular lotteries.Our goal is to make PLT a popular cryptocurrency with high value, which will allow you to make great profits and achieve financial independence! The project was launched in 2021 but has already attracted the attention of a large number of users.We held several contests and raffled valuable prizes among the participants. Moreover, we plan to launch several more different lottery types and list the token on reliable and well-known cryptocurrency exchanges. For example, we have already begun to cooperate with the high-quality DODOEX platform.And a little more about our advantages:https://i.imgur.com/qLSKL74.pngAnd every coin holder can quickly and easily take part in the drawing of valuable prizes. You need to take a few simple steps:Register a wallet where you will store PLT in the future.Add our token to the list of preferred currencies (use PLT address 0x631c2f0edabac799f07550aee4ff0bf7fd35212b).Exchange or buy PLT on the exchange. Today we cooperate with such popular and reliable platforms as PancakeSwap, DodoEx, BscScan, CoinmarketCap, and Coingecko.Buy a lottery ticket (cost is $5) and wait for the next stage of the lottery (a new drawing takes place every 90 minutes)!Compare the winning number with your wallet number.Get prizes!Look for more updates! Indeed, already in the second quarter of 2022, we plan to launch new types of lotteries and games based on the blockchain. Moreover, soon you will be able to get a mobile application to always be in touch.After all, our team of professionals is not just employees, but real like-minded people who want to make a truly convenient and promising product. Be the first to know important information!Together we are creating a new future of cryptocurrencies!Get PLTPoollotto Token (PLT) is a new generation of lottery token-based smart contracts for non-centralized management of the global community-driven lottery pools, automated and safe payments.To get started you need a crypto wallet – this is where you store your tokens. You’ll need to choose the wallet that fits your needs best and supports Binance Smart Chain (BSC). We recommend to use Trust Wallet or MetaMask.Locate your PLT adress. Once you have your crypto wallet it’s time to add PLT token. A PLT address is a long string of letters and numbers, which you need to add to the list of tokens in your wallet.0x631c2f0edabac799f07550aee4ff0bf7fd35212bExchange PLT in the widget or you can use exchange from the list belowhttps://i.imgur.com/k8zqw8J.pngPlay and Win :- https://metalottery.winFOR MORE INFO :- https://linktr.ee/metalottery.winVerified By :- https://pltlotto.com/

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk this is not the first time I've seen a lottery token-based site but unfortunately, they did not reach the level of success of other online casinos, because they are token based and do not accept Bitcoin, I'm afraid you'll have to move this in the altcoin service section or it will be moved.I still wish you success on your platform and hopefully, you can offer something that is different from all the other token-based lotteries.   To maximize your promotion I recommend that you get a copper account.

comments.author: Metalottery.Win
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on March 13, 2023, 01:04:28 PMWelcome to Bitcointalk this is not the first time I've seen a lottery token-based site but unfortunately, they did not reach the level of success of other online casinos, because they are token based and do not accept Bitcoin, I'm afraid you'll have to move this in the altcoin service section or it will be moved.I still wish you success on your platform and hopefully, you can offer something that is different from all the other token-based lotteries.   To maximize your promotion I recommend that you get a copper account.thank you bro, and yes i understand your point here, and we already have successful site poollotto.finance ahh copper account , thanks bro

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Welcome to the forum and it's good to see another lottery site.I'm just wondering what is the advantage of this site compare to its competitor and do you have any plan to offer any gambling games and accept other crypto as well aside from your own token? I'm quiet curious about the future of lottery since some site are  offering this along with their other games, maybe lottery alone is not that effective. Anyway, waiting to see more updates from this site, so good luck.

You are welcome to the forum.I think you should get a copper member account from https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promoteSo that your pictures can be visible and make your post more detailed and unique, if your project is of good intention, we will be seeing you around here more often and hopefully will have to test your platform some day. But this is your connect wallet option on your platform. I really don't think anyone will want to use that option since your platform is just new. An account creation option would have been best, followed by a manual deposit. Just my opinion, though.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Welcome onboard ops and you have done well in your introduction write ups, but just that your current account rank restrict you from a lot of things such as posting of image and other content. -So I advise you to get a copper member account for as to be able to post whatever content you wish to post in your ANN, Good luck mate

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: I tried to briefly review the Metalottery.Win lottery site, I saw several features such as Home to white paper, words that are easy to understand, as well as how to play and buy the lottery and the price of one lottery ticket.You offer the PLT token and also the Wallet is directly connected to the Trust Wallet or MetaMask wallet, it looks good.But there's a bit of a question for the OP as well as a change.1. Where is the place of registration, is the user directly connecting the Wallet already considered a participant and can immediately play, after purchasing the PLT token.2. Do you have no deposit or withdrawal feature of Bitcoin.3. I see that there are only BNB and PLT.4. My advice, make some changes to make it easier for users to deposit and withdraw with Bitcoin.5. I think very few users have balances in Trust Wallet or MetaMask, for reasons of security and so on.6. After all, many members here have Bitcoin reserves instead of BNB in ​​their wallets.I think you should read the policies and rules of gambling that you put on this forum.Topic: Giveaways and games that pay out altcoins do NOT belong here.You should add a deposit and withdrawal feature with Bitcoin. before being moved to the Altcoin board.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: YOSHIE on March 13, 2023, 02:44:43 PMI think you should read the policies and rules of gambling that you put on this forum.Topic: Giveaways and games that pay out altcoins do NOT belong here.You should add a deposit and withdrawal feature with Bitcoin. before being moved to the Altcoin board.It was recommended to him that he opened a thread here for his crypto lottery site article but he did not mention that his gambling platform is not accepting Bitcoin and he also mention that its an article, not a gambling platform so there is a misinterpretation, it will eventually be moved in the altcoin service but if can promise that he can add Bitcoin then he can retain his thread here.Quote from: Metalottery.Win on March 12, 2023, 09:44:55 PMHello everyone  i am new here, i want to share my crypto lottery site article here,can anyone show me a way, where i can post about my site. thanks

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Welcome to the forum and sorry in advance it is true what some people here said that token-based gambling is difficult to get bigger unless you add our favorite coins like bitcoin.Because in this section of gambling, almost all the successful and popular bets here all accept bitcoins for betting and almost everyone here likes betting using bitcoins.I hope you can consider some of the suggestions from all who reply to your thread.

comments.body: Quote from: Metalottery.Win on March 13, 2023, 01:50:19 PMthank you bro, and yes i understand your point here, and we already have successful site pool lotto.finance ahh copper account, thanks bro  Good to know that you already have a sister company account here that is a copper member if your services are ok and you remain active soon you will get to a junior member or even above so that your account limit will be increased all the same welcime and take your time to understand the rules of tgis board.

I'm quiet curious about the future of lottery since some site are  offering this along with their other games, maybe lottery alone is not that effective. Anyway, waiting to see more updates from this site, so good luck. thank you for welcoming me! yes we have so many plans for futures i mean for more games, but right now our focus on lottery, and yes soon we launch bitcoin and other crypto too, because not too much PLT COIN users in gaming gambling market, so 60% of our players want other coins too.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on March 13, 2023, 02:29:15 PMBut this is your connect wallet option on your platform. I really don't think anyone will want to use that option since your platform is just new. An account creation option would have been best, followed by a manual deposit. Just my opinion, though. Account creation too does not guarantee that the platform can be trusted or not. If their aim is  to scam you, they will let you create an address which they also have private key access to, wait for you to deposit and then move off the funds. Just saying.It all comes down to how genuine the creators of the platform are. Otherwise, welcome to the forum Metalottery.Win

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Welcome to the forum mate. The site seems to have interesting concept, but the way of presenting it here seems to be boring. I mean who likes to read only text and that too this much big without any attractive images or graphics? I know you have written a lot of information about the site, and I appreciate that, but writing it in a professional manner could have made you stand out among the other newbies. I would suggest you to buy a copper membership, and redesign your ANN, this will fetch more audience for your site. Lottery sites aren’t new to the gamblers here in the forum, so make sure you offer something unique and new to us.

comments.author: Krislaw
comments.body: As much as I love the concept of your website, I am more concerned about the past and current performance of PLT token as shown on Coinmarketcap and it isn't really impressive and it would scare someone like me to want to purchase a token with low daily transaction volume and little liquidity. Just imagine a big win and I am unable to trade my tokens because there is no liquidity. And also, the tokenomics are confusing as well. Currently, the top two holders are holding around 70% of the supply which is huge. According to the whitepaper, 35% is meant for Allocation for lottery pools will be distributed for 2 years for promotion and adoption, but i see nothing like that here. Wallet address 0x2179ef18000938434ffd6608631961d164def3b4 is holding 37.6408% and has been the one making outgoing transactions which I believe could be the wallet that's handling the promotion and adoption but isn't the 35% like the whitepaper said. The second wallet holding 33.7218% doesn't have outgoing transaction and the last incoming transaction on the wallet an amount 5.4 million tokens. Do you mind explaining what the wallet is meant for and why the tokenomics doesn't actually match well?Welcome to the forum btw. Hoping to read your response.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: Krislaw on March 14, 2023, 09:04:57 PMAs much as I love the concept of your website, I am more concerned about the past and current performance of PLT token as shown on Coinmarketcap and it isn't really impressive and it would scare someone like me to want to purchase a token with low daily transaction volume and little liquidity. Just imagine a big win and I am unable to trade my tokens because there is no liquidity. And also, the tokenomics are confusing as well. Currently, the top two holders are holding around 70% of the supply which is huge.~ Well, you can still exchange your PLT tokens, for example, for MEXC (trading volume per day ~ $78k) or for PancakeSwap, where there is liquidity of $77.62k, unless, of course, you are going to win a significantly larger amount.I think that the two addresses where 70% of PLT tokens are bankroll pools of their two lotto sites, so in addition to the one being discussed, there is another site pltlotto.com , although I think OP will answer this question.
